purpose: Provide free educational resources and courses on AI-generated content (AIGC) technologies
principle: Offers structured courses and tutorials on various AI tools and platforms, enabling users to learn and apply AI technologies effectively
reusability: Open-source platform that can be extended with additional courses and integrated with other educational tools
limitations: Primarily focused on Chinese language content, limited to the AI tools and technologies currently covered
name: LearnPrompt
description: 永久免费开源的 AIGC 课程, 目前已支持Prompt Engineering, ChatGPT, Midjourney, Runway, Stable Diffusion, AI数字人，AI声音&音乐，开源大模型
highlight: Comprehensive open-source AIGC course platform supporting multiple AI technologies and tools
